downloadTitle: Microsoft Connectors v4.0 for Oracle and Teradata
downloadDescription: Download the SSIS Connectors v4.0 for Oracle and Teradata that provide additional value for SQL Server Integration Services.
detailsSection:
Microsoft Connector Version 4.0 for Oracle by Attunity - The Oracle source and destination components are written to achieve optimal performance when loading data into Oracle or unloading data from Oracle in the context of Microsoft SSIS.

Microsoft Connector Version 4.0 for Teradata by Attunity - The components are written to achieve optimal performance when loading data into Teradata or unloading data from Teradata in the context of Microsoft SSIS.

Microsoft SSIS Connectors by Attunity Version 4.0 is a minor release. It supports SQL Server 2016 Integration Services and includes bug fixes and support for updated Oracle and Teradata product releases.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Required operating environment : Enterprise or Developer edition of SQL Server 2016 Integration Services
  • Supported Oracle databases : Oracle 10.x; Oracle 11.x; Oracle 12c
  • Supported Teradata databases : Teradata Database 14.0; Teradata Database 14.10; Teradata Database 15.0; Teradata Database 15.1
  • Supported TPT API versions : 14.0 (14.00.00.02 or higher); 14.10; 15; 15.10
installInstructionSection:
• Download the appropriate file by clicking the correct DOWNLOAD button as outlined below, then run the downloaded file to install that package.

  • Microsoft Connector Version 4.0 for Oracle The Microsoft Connector for Oracle is a set of managed components for transferring data from or to an Oracle database. The component is designed to be used with the Enterprise and Developer editions of SQL Server 2016 Integration Services and will only operate in those environments. To install the component, run the platform-specific installer for x86 or x64 computers respectively. Read the installation topic in the Help file for installation prerequisites and additional information.

    X86 Package (AttunitySSISOraAdaptersSetup.msi)

    X64 Package (AttunitySSISOraAdaptersSetupX64.msi)


  • Microsoft Connector Version 4.0 for Teradata The Microsoft Connector for Teradata is a set of managed components for transferring data from or to Teradata database. The component is designed to be used with the Enterprise and Developer editions of SQL Server 2016 Integration Services and will only operate in those environments. To install the component, run the platform-specific installer for x86 or x64 computers respectively. Read the installation topic in the Help file for installation prerequisites and additional information.

    X86 Package (AttunitySSISTeraAdaptersSetup.msi)

    X64 Package (AttunitySSISTeraAdaptersSetupX64.msi)
